data.lyric:
[ti:Wham / Last Christmas]
[ar:Wham!]
[al:Absolute Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Wham / Last Christmas - Wham! (威猛乐队)
[00:18.59]Last Christmas I gave you my heart
[00:22.64]But the very next day you gave it away
[00:27.38]This year to save me from tears
[00:31.70]I'll give it to someone special
[00:36.47]Last Christmas I gave you my heart
[00:40.54]But the very next day you gave it away
[00:43.97]You gave it away
[00:45.46]This year to save me from tears
[00:49.51]I'll give it to someone special
[00:52.89]Special
[01:13.07]Once bitten and twice shy
[01:17.13]I keep my distance but you still catch my eye
[01:21.91]Tell me baby do you recognize me
[01:25.94]Well it's been a year it doesn't surprise me
[01:31.12]Happy Christmas
[01:32.32]I wrapped it up and sent it
[01:34.96]With a note saying 'I love you' I meant it
[01:39.33]Now I know what a fool I've been
[01:42.96]But if you kissed me now I know you'd fool me again
[01:48.49]Last Christmas I gave you my heart
[01:52.25]But the very next day you gave it away
[01:56.50]You gave it away
[01:57.39]This year to save me from tears
[02:01.46]I'll give it to someone special
[02:04.70]Special
[02:06.27]Last Christmas I gave you my heart
[02:10.32]But the very next day you gave it away
[02:15.33]This year to save me from tears
[02:19.64]I'll give it to someone special
[02:22.70]Special
[02:24.11]Oh oh my baby
[02:42.87]Crowded room friends with tired eyes
[02:47.46]I'm hiding from you and your soul of ice
[02:51.70]My god I thought you were someone to rely on
[02:55.67]Me I guess I was a shoulder to cry on
[02:59.74]A face on a lover with a fire in his heart
[03:04.40]A man undercover but you tore him apart
[03:11.66]Ooh hoo now I've found a real love
[03:15.26]You'll never fool me again
[03:18.26]Last Christmas I gave you my heart
[03:22.17]But the very next day you gave it away
[03:26.25]You gave it away
[03:27.12]This year to save me from tears
[03:31.36]I'll give it to someone special
[03:34.71]Special
[03:36.07]Last Christmas I gave you my heart
[03:40.13]But the very next day you gave it away
[03:43.70]You gave me away
[03:45.12]This year to save me from tears
[03:49.37]I'll give it to someone special
[03:52.58]Special
[03:54.10]A face on a lover with a fire in his heart
[03:57.82]Gave you my heart
[03:58.72]A man undercover but you tore him apart
[04:03.42]Maybe next year I'll give it to someone
[04:09.61]I'll give it to someone special
[04:13.65]Special
[04:17.05]Someone
data.trans:
[ti:Wham / Last Christmas]
[ar:Wham!]
[al:Absolute Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:18.59]去年的圣诞节 我把心给了你
[00:22.64]但隔天你就将它丢弃
[00:27.38]今年 我在泪水中重新振作
[00:31.70]我会把心交给一个特别的人
[00:36.47]去年的圣诞节 我把心给了你
[00:40.54]但隔天你就将它丢弃
[00:43.97]你就将它丢弃
[00:45.46]今年 我在泪水中重新振作
[00:49.51]我会把心交给一个特别的人
[00:52.89]特别的人
[01:13.07]曾经受伤 不免心存畏惧
[01:17.13]我保持着距离 但你依然吸引着我的目光
[01:21.91]告诉我 宝贝 你认出我了吗
[01:25.94]已经过了一年 我并不惊讶
[01:31.12]圣诞快乐
[01:32.32]我包装好后将它送出
[01:34.96]附上写着我爱你的纸条 我是认真的
[01:39.33]现在我才知道当初真傻
[01:42.96]但如果你现在吻我 你可以再次愚弄我
[01:48.49]去年的圣诞节 我把心给了你
[01:52.25]但隔天你就将它丢弃
[01:56.50]你就将它丢弃
[01:57.39]今年 我在泪水中重新振作
[02:01.46]我会把心交给一个特别的人
[02:04.70]特别的人
[02:06.27]去年的圣诞节 我把心给了你
[02:10.32]但隔天你就将它丢弃
[02:15.33]今年 我在泪水中重新振作
[02:19.64]我会把心交给一个特别的人
[02:22.70]特别的人
[02:24.11]我的宝贝
[02:42.87]拥挤的房间里 朋友们眼神疲惫
[02:47.46]我想躲避你和你冰冷的灵魂
[02:51.70]老天 我曾以为我能依靠你
[02:55.67]我以为我就是你可以靠着哭泣的肩膀
[02:59.74]有着火热的心的爱人脸庞
[03:04.40]刻意掩饰 你欲将我拆穿
[03:11.66]我现已另觅他人
[03:15.26]你不能再愚弄我
[03:18.26]去年的圣诞节 我把心给了你
[03:22.17]但隔天你就将它丢弃
[03:26.25]你就将它丢弃
[03:27.12]今年 我在泪水中重新振作
[03:31.36]我会把心交给一个特别的人
[03:34.71]特别的人
[03:36.07]去年的圣诞节 我把心给了你
[03:40.13]但隔天你就将它丢弃
[03:43.70]你就将它丢弃
[03:45.12]今年 我在泪水中重新振作
[03:49.37]我会把心交给一个特别的人
[03:52.58]特别的人
[03:54.10]有着火热的心的爱人脸庞
[03:57.82]我把心给了你
[03:58.72]刻意掩饰 你欲将我拆穿
[04:03.42]或许明年 我会把心交给一个特别的人
